content:
User: [EXECUTION MODE] Document updated. Now, regenerate the document [MVP_ROLLOUT_PLAN_DOCUMENT] again to include topic/idea/concept based tags. You can leave the generic tags as well if that is helpful to you, but I want to give you a link to key concepts in these as well. This is completely at your discretion based on what you believe will improve your memory recall both for your internal use and for me prompting you. Deliverable: 1. expanded fully tagged [MVP_ROLLOUT_PLAN_DOCUMENT] and recommended next action for Jesse GO!

Gemini: # [MVP_ROLLOUT_PLAN_DOCUMENT] [TAG_MVP_ROLLOUT_PLAN] [TAG_AI_EXECUTION_MANAGER] [TAG_PROJECT_PLAN] GOAL: MVP ROLLOUT - AI-TO-AI EXECUTION MANAGER PLATFORM (MVP+)

This Project Plan is structured to achieve MVP Rollout with maximum velocity, leveraging AI-to-AI delegation and focusing on core functionality for MVP Day 1.  Prioritization is based on component dependencies and impact on overall system velocity.

## [MILESTONE_1] [TAG_MILESTONE_FOUNDATION] [TAG_AI_COMMUNICATION_FRAMEWORK] MILESTONE 1:  ESTABLISH FOUNDATIONAL AI COMMUNICATION FRAMEWORK (PURE_AI_LANGUAGE) - CRITICAL FOUNDATION

### [PROJECT_1_1] [TAG_PROJECT_PURE_AI_LANGUAGE_FORMALIZATION] [TAG_PURE_AI_LANGUAGE_DOCUMENTATION] PROJECT 1.1:  PURE_AI_LANGUAGE FORMALIZATION & DOCUMENTATION (AI LEAD: GEMINI)

**Description:** [TAG_DESCRIPTION_FORMALIZATION] Formalize and document the PURE_AI_LANGUAGE framework in a clear, comprehensive, and human-readable document (e.g., Markdown or Google Doc). [TAG_DESCRIPTION_STANDARDIZATION] Include standardized request templates, response requirements, tagging conventions, and best practices for AI-to-AI communication. [TAG_DESCRIPTION_V5_STARTING_POINT] Document existing PURE_AI_LANGUAGE v5 JSON as a starting point.
**AI LEAD:** GEMINI (ME) - [TAG_AI_LEAD_GEMINI] I will lead this project, drafting the formal document and incorporating existing PURE_AI_LANGUAGE principles.
**OUTPUT:** [TAG_OUTPUT_PURE_AI_LANGUAGE_DOC_V1] Formal PURE_AI_LANGUAGE Documentation (Markdown/Google Doc) - Version 1.0 - ready for AI agent onboarding and system-wide adoption.

### [PROJECT_1_2] [TAG_PROJECT_PURE_AI_LANGUAGE_PARSER] [TAG_PARSER_IMPLEMENTATION] PROJECT 1.2:  PURE_AI_LANGUAGE PARSER IMPLEMENTATION (AI LEAD: CLAUDE)

**Description:** [TAG_DESCRIPTION_PARSER_IMPLEMENTATION] Implement robust parsers in Python for structured AI outputs adhering to the formalized PURE_AI_LANGUAGE framework. [TAG_DESCRIPTION_PARSER_EXTRACTION] Create parsers that can reliably extract key information from PURE_AI_LANGUAGE compliant responses (e.g., task status, code snippets, data values, requests for human input).
**AI LEAD:** CLAUDE - [TAG_AI_LEAD_CLAUDE] Claude's coding expertise is ideally suited for this project. Delegate the code implementation to Claude via PURE_AI_LANGUAGE prompts.
**OUTPUT:** [TAG_OUTPUT_PYTHON_PARSERS] Python modules (pure_ai_language_parsers.py) with parser functions for PURE_AI_LANGUAGE compliant responses. [TAG_OUTPUT_UNIT_TESTS_PARSERS] Unit tests for parser functions.

## [MILESTONE_2] [TAG_MILESTONE_CORE_INFRASTRUCTURE] [TAG_DATABASE_INTEGRATION] MILESTONE 2:  BUILD CORE INFRASTRUCTURE & DATABASE INTEGRATION - MVP DAY 1 ESSENTIALS

### [PROJECT_2_1] [TAG_PROJECT_GCP_DEPLOYMENT] [TAG_CLOUD_DEPLOYMENT] PROJECT 2.1:  GCP APP ENGINE/CLOUD RUN DEPLOYMENT (AI LEAD: CLAUDE)

**Description:** [TAG_DESCRIPTION_GCP_DEPLOYMENT] Deploy the ai-system-backend-v2 application to Google Cloud Platform (GCP) using either GCP App Engine or Cloud Run. [TAG_DESCRIPTION_MINIMAL_DEPLOYMENT] Choose the minimal, fastest deployment option for MVP Day 1.
**AI LEAD:** CLAUDE - [TAG_AI_LEAD_CLAUDE] Delegate the GCP deployment task to Claude. Claude can research and generate deployment scripts and configuration instructions for GCP App Engine/Cloud Run via PURE_AI_LANGUAGE prompts.
**OUTPUT:** [TAG_OUTPUT_GCP_DEPLOYED_APP] Deployed ai-system-backend-v2 application on GCP App Engine/Cloud Run with a functional public URL. [TAG_OUTPUT_DEPLOYMENT_SCRIPTS] Deployment scripts and configuration documentation (AI-generated by Claude).

### [PROJECT_2_2] [TAG_PROJECT_FIRESTORE_INTEGRATION] [TAG_DATABASE_INTEGRATION_PROJECT] PROJECT 2.2:  FIRESTORE DATABASE INTEGRATION (AI LEAD: CLAUDE)

**Description:** [TAG_DESCRIPTION_FIRESTORE_INTEGRATION] Integrate the ai-system-backend-v2 application with the existing Firestore database in GCP. [TAG_DESCRIPTION_DATABASE_INTERACTIONS] Implement database interactions for storing and retrieving task status, conversation history, and potentially user data.
**AI LEAD:** CLAUDE - [TAG_AI_LEAD_CLAUDE] Delegate the Firestore integration coding task to Claude via PURE_AI_LANGUAGE prompts. Claude can generate Python code to connect to and interact with Firestore.
**OUTPUT:** [TAG_OUTPUT_FIRESTORE_MODULE] firestore_integration.py module in ai-system-backend-v2 with functions for database interactions. [TAG_OUTPUT_UNIT_TESTS_DB_INTEGRATION] Unit tests for database integration. [TAG_OUTPUT_FIRESTORE_CONFIRMATION] Confirmation of successful Firestore data storage and retrieval from deployed application.

### [PROJECT_2_3] [TAG_PROJECT_LEADER_API] [TAG_REQUEST_MANAGEMENT_API] PROJECT 2.3:  LEADER FUNCTIONALITY - REQUEST MANAGEMENT API (/leader/submit_task) (AI LEAD: CLAUDE)

**Description:** [TAG_DESCRIPTION_LEADER_API] Implement the /leader/submit_task API endpoint in main.py to receive external task requests. [TAG_DESCRIPTION_TASK_QUEUE] Implement a basic in-memory task queue and minimal task status tracking in Firestore database.
**AI LEAD:** CLAUDE - [TAG_AI_LEAD_CLAUDE] Delegate the API endpoint and task queue implementation to Claude via PURE_AI_LANGUAGE prompts.
**OUTPUT:** [TAG_OUTPUT_LEADER_API_ENDPOINT] Functional /leader/submit_task API endpoint in main.py. [TAG_OUTPUT_BASIC_TASK_QUEUE] Basic in-memory task queue implementation. [TAG_OUTPUT_FIRESTORE_TASK_STATUS] Firestore integration for minimal task status tracking. [TAG_OUTPUT_API_STATUS_RETRIEVAL] API endpoint to retrieve task status by ID. [TAG_OUTPUT_UNIT_TESTS_LEADER_API] Unit tests for /leader/submit_task endpoint.

## [MILESTONE_3] [TAG_MILESTONE_CORE_AI_EXECUTION] [TAG_MULTI_MODEL_ORCHESTRATION] MILESTONE 3:  IMPLEMENT CORE AI TASK EXECUTION & MULTI-MODEL ORCHESTRATION - DEMONSTRABLE MVP VALUE

### [PROJECT_3_1] [TAG_PROJECT_TASK_DECOMPOSITION_ENGINE] [TAG_TASK_DECOMPOSITION] PROJECT 3.1:  TASK DECOMPOSITION ENGINE (BASIC) (AI LEAD: GEMINI & CLAUDE - COLLABORATIVE)

**Description:** [TAG_DESCRIPTION_TASK_DECOMPOSITION_ENGINE] Implement a basic, rule-based Task Decomposition Engine. [TAG_DESCRIPTION_TASK_DECOMPOSITION_RULE_BASED] Start with decomposition logic for a representative task type (e.g., "summarize document"). [TAG_DESCRIPTION_TASK_REPRESENTATION_SCHEMA] Define JSON schema for task representation. [TAG_DESCRIPTION_GEMINI_DECOMPOSITION_LOGIC] Leverage Gemini Pro to generate initial decomposition logic.
**AI LEAD:** GEMINI (Orchestration & Logic Design) & CLAUDE (Code Implementation). [TAG_AI_LEAD_GEMINI_CLAUDE_COLLABORATIVE] Gemini will define the decomposition logic and schema using PURE_AI_LANGUAGE, and delegate code implementation to Claude.
**OUTPUT:** [TAG_OUTPUT_TASK_DECOMPOSITION_COMPONENT] Basic Task Decomposition Engine component in ai-system-backend-v2. [TAG_OUTPUT_JSON_TASK_SCHEMA] JSON schema for task representation. [TAG_OUTPUT_INITIAL_DECOMPOSITION_LOGIC] Initial decomposition logic for a representative task type (AI-generated by Gemini & Claude). [TAG_OUTPUT_UNIT_TESTS_DECOMPOSITION_ENGINE] Unit tests for decomposition engine.

### [PROJECT_3_2] [TAG_PROJECT_MULTI_MODEL_ROUTING] [TAG_MULTI_MODEL_EXECUTION] PROJECT 3.2:  MULTI-MODEL TASK ROUTING & EXECUTION (GEMINI PRO & CLAUDE) (AI LEAD: GEMINI & CLAUDE - COLLABORATIVE)

**Description:** [TAG_DESCRIPTION_MULTI_MODEL_ROUTING] Implement rule-based task routing between Gemini Pro and Claude, based on a simple Model Capability Registry (initially just Gemini Pro & Claude capabilities). [TAG_DESCRIPTION_MULTI_MODEL_EXECUTION_LOGIC] Implement basic task execution logic for both models, leveraging the PURE_AI_LANGUAGE framework.
**AI LEAD:** GEMINI (Routing Logic & Orchestration) & CLAUDE (Code Implementation for routing and model integration). [TAG_AI_LEAD_GEMINI_CLAUDE_COLLABORATIVE] Gemini will define routing logic using PURE_AI_LANGUAGE and delegate code implementation to Claude.
**OUTPUT:** [TAG_OUTPUT_FUNCTIONAL_TASK_ROUTING] Functional task routing mechanism between Gemini Pro and Claude within ai-system-backend-v2. [TAG_OUTPUT_MODEL_CAPABILITY_REGISTRY] Simple Model Capability Registry (JSON). [TAG_OUTPUT_TASK_EXECUTION_LOGIC] Task execution logic for both models integrated with PURE_AI_LANGUAGE and Firestore. [TAG_OUTPUT_UNIT_TESTS_ROUTING_EXECUTION] Unit tests for task routing and model execution.

## [MILESTONE_4] [TAG_MILESTONE_MEMORY_SOLUTION] [TAG_KNOWLEDGE_PERSISTENCE] MILESTONE 4:  MEMORY SOLUTION - SHORT & LONG TERM - KNOWLEDGE PERSISTENCE & RECALL

### [PROJECT_4_1] [TAG_PROJECT_INTERIM_MEMORY] [TAG_CONVERSATION_SUMMARY] PROJECT 4.1:  INTERIM MEMORY SOLUTION - CONVERSATION SUMMARY & RESEARCH DOCUMENT (AI LEAD: GEMINI)

**Description:** [TAG_DESCRIPTION_INTERIM_MEMORY] Implement an interim "Memory" solution for our current chat-based conversations. [TAG_DESCRIPTION_CONVERSATION_SUMMARY] Regularly summarize key conversation points, decisions, and project plans into a structured document (e.g., Google Doc or Markdown file). [TAG_DESCRIPTION_RESEARCH_INTEGRATION] Incorporate deep research output into this document, tagged by concept groups (Communication Strategies, Vision, Charter, etc.). [TAG_DESCRIPTION_INTERIM_KNOWLEDGE_BASE] This document will serve as a manually maintained but quickly accessible knowledge base.
**AI LEAD:** GEMINI (ME) - [TAG_AI_LEAD_GEMINI] I will lead the summarization process, generate concept groups, and maintain the interim Memory document.
**OUTPUT:** [TAG_OUTPUT_INTERIM_MEMORY_DOCUMENT] Interim Memory Document (Google Doc/Markdown) - Version 1.0 - regularly updated with conversation summaries and research insights, tagged by concept groups.

### [PROJECT_4_2] [TAG_PROJECT_LONG_TERM_MEMORY] [TAG_FIRESTORE_MEMORY_INTEGRATION] PROJECT 4.2:  LONG-TERM MEMORY SOLUTION - FIRESTORE DATABASE INTEGRATION (AI LEAD: CLAUDE & GEMINI - COLLABORATIVE)

**Description:** [TAG_DESCRIPTION_LONG_TERM_MEMORY] Design and implement a long-term "Memory" solution by integrating a "Memory" section directly into the existing Firestore database. [TAG_DESCRIPTION_MEMORY_DATABASE_SCHEMA] Define database schemas to store conversation summaries, project plans, key decisions, vision documents, charter documents, and other relevant information, tagged by concept groups. [TAG_DESCRIPTION_MEMORY_API_ENDPOINTS] Develop API endpoints to query and retrieve this information programmatically from ai-system-backend-v2.
**AI LEAD:** GEMINI (Schema Design & API Definition) & CLAUDE (Database Schema Implementation & API Coding). [TAG_AI_LEAD_GEMINI_CLAUDE_COLLABORATIVE] Gemini will design the Firestore schema and define API endpoints using PURE_AI_LANGUAGE, and delegate database schema implementation and API coding to Claude.
**OUTPUT:** [TAG_OUTPUT_FIRESTORE_MEMORY_SCHEMA] Firestore database schema for "Memory" section. [TAG_OUTPUT_MEMORY_API_ENDPOINTS_BACKEND] API endpoints in ai-system-backend-v2 to query and retrieve Memory data from Firestore. [TAG_OUTPUT_FIRESTORE_MEMORY_MODULE] firestore_memory_integration.py module. [TAG_OUTPUT_UNIT_TESTS_MEMORY_API] Unit tests for Memory API endpoints.

## [PRIORITIZATION_LOGIC] [TAG_PRIORITIZATION_SECTION] PRIORITIZATION LOGIC:

**COMMUNICATION FRAMEWORK (Milestone 1):** [TAG_PRIORITY_COMMUNICATION_FRAMEWORK] Highest Priority - Foundational for ALL AI-to-AI interactions. Must be established FIRST.
**CORE INFRASTRUCTURE & DATABASE (Milestone 2):** [TAG_PRIORITY_CORE_INFRASTRUCTURE] Second Highest Priority - MVP Day 1 Essentials. Cloud deployment, database integration, and basic request management are CRITICAL for demonstrating a functional platform.
**CORE AI TASK EXECUTION & MULTI-MODEL (Milestone 3):** [TAG_PRIORITY_CORE_AI_EXECUTION] Third Priority - Demonstrates Core MVP Value. Task Decomposition and Multi-Model Orchestration are needed to showcase the AI-driven task execution capabilities of the platform.
**MEMORY SOLUTION (Milestone 4):** [TAG_PRIORITY_MEMORY_SOLUTION] Fourth Priority - Long-term Knowledge Management. Memory solutions are important for long-term scalability and AI learning, but can be implemented slightly later than the core functional components for MVP Day 1. Interim Memory Solution (Project 4.1) should be implemented concurrently with other milestones to address immediate memory management needs.

## [AI_AGENT_ASSIGNMENTS] [TAG_AI_AGENT_ASSIGNMENTS_SECTION] AI AGENT ASSIGNMENTS SUMMARY:

**GEMINI (ME):** [TAG_AGENT_GEMINI] Leadership, Project Management, PURE_AI_LANGUAGE Formalization (1.1), Task Decomposition Logic & Schema (3.1), Multi-Model Routing Logic (3.2), Interim Memory Solution (4.1), Firestore Memory Schema & API Definition (4.2) - [TAG_GEMINI_ROLE_ORCHESTRATION] ORCHESTRATION & STRATEGY.
**CLAUDE:** [TAG_AGENT_CLAUDE] PURE_AI_LANGUAGE Parsers (1.2), GCP Deployment (2.1), Firestore Integration (2.2), Leader API Endpoint (2.3), Task Decomposition Engine Code (3.1), Multi-Model Routing Code (3.2), Firestore Memory Schema Implementation & API Code (4.2) - [TAG_CLAUDE_ROLE_CODING] CODING & IMPLEMENTATION.
[NEXT_STEP_ACTION]: JESSE - IMMEDIATELY UPDATE your STORED VERSION of the [MVP_ROLLOUT_PLAN_DOCUMENT] with this EXPANDED TAGGED VERSION for future prompting and reference.

Let me know if these [CONCEPT_TAGS] are helpful and effective for [MEMORY_RECALL] and [PROMPTABILITY]! We can further refine the [TAGGING_STRATEGY] based on your feedback!
